title: The Heroes Must Die - Novel Updates
tags: Cunning Protagonist   Dark   Death of Loved Ones   Demon Lord   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Former Hero   Healers   Heroes   Magic   Oneshot   Selfish Protagonist   Witches
author: Kocher   コーチャー
description: One day, the witch Lisa, one of the four heroes who defeated the Demon King, is visited by the sage. What came out of his mouth was a sad event in which the hero was killed by the priestess who was supposed to be his lover. Wizard Lisa wondered why her fellow companion killed the hero.>
